name: tabmgr
description: An extension for managing tab groups in a more dynamic and ephemeral way than Google seems to intend they be used.

newTab.description: Create a new tab in a new group.

move.description: Move the current tab to a new group.

closeElse.description: Close all groups except the current one.

expand.description: Expand all groups except the current one.

collapse.description: Collapse all groups except the current one.
